result.ga: Beidh mé ó thuaidh i nDoire
result.orig: Beidh mé ó thuaidh i nDoire
result.html: Beidh mé ó thuaidh i nDoireI'll be up in Derry.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ mé ó ṫuaiḋ i nDoireI'll be up in Derry.

result.eng: We are going to the north.
result.ga: Tá muid ag dul ó thuaidh
result.orig: Tá muid ag dul ó thuaidh
result.html: Tá muid ag dul ó thuaidhWe are going to the north.
result.ponchtml: Tá muid ag dul ó ṫuaiḋWe are going to the north.

result.eng: There was sand to every side of us, east and west, north and south.
result.ga: Bhí gaineamh do gach leith dínn soir siar thuaidh theas
result.orig: Bhí gaineamh do gach leith dínn soir siar thuaidh theas
result.html: Bhí gaineamh do gach leith dínn soir siar thuaidh theasThere was sand to every side of us, east and west, north and south.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí gaineaṁ do gaċ leiṫ dínn soir siar ṫuaiḋ ṫeasThere was sand to every side of us, east and west, north and south.

result.eng: Cane was planted in the Caribbean area and cotton further west and north.
result.ga: Cuireadh cána i gceantar na Cairibe agus cadás níos faide siar agus ó thuaidh
result.orig: Cuireadh cána i gceantar na Cairibe agus cadás níos faide siar agus ó thuaidh
result.html: Cuireadh cána i gceantar na Cairibe agus cadás níos faide siar agus ó thuaidhCane was planted in the Caribbean area and cotton further west and north.
result.ponchtml: Cuireaḋ cána i gceantar na Cairibe agus cadás níos faide siar agus ó ṫuaiḋCane was planted in the Caribbean area and cotton further west and north.

result.eng: By the year 1776 slavery was ended in many of the northern states.
result.ga: Faoin mbliain 1776 bhí deireadh le sclábhaíocht i roinnt de na stáit thuaidh
result.orig: Faoin mbliain 1776 bhí deireadh le sclábhaíocht i roinnt de na stáit thuaidh
result.html: Faoin mbliain 1776 bhí deireadh le sclábhaíocht i roinnt de na stáit thuaidhBy the year 1776 slavery was ended in many of the northern states.
result.ponchtml: Faoin mbliain 1776 ḃí deireaḋ le scláḃaíoċt i roinnt de na stáit ṫuaiḋBy the year 1776 slavery was ended in many of the northern states.
